doctors.name: Dr. Anushka Perera
doctors.about: Dr. Anushka Perera is dedicated to providing comprehensive medical care, focusing on preventive medicine and effective treatment strategies. And also has a strong commitment to delivering comprehensive medical care, evaluate and check colds, flu, hypertension, and asthma.

doctors.name: Dr. Bella Fernando
doctors.about: Dr. Nadee Fernando has a strong commitment to delivering comprehensive medical care, focusing on preventive medicine, early diagnosis, and effective treatment strategies.

doctors.name: Dr. Michael Brown
doctors.about: Dr. Brown focuses on skin health, offering treatments for a variety of dermatological conditions.

doctors.name: Dr. Chris Miller
doctors.about: Dr. Miller is devoted to the health and well-being of children, offering compassionate and thorough pediatric care.

doctors.name: Dr. Priya Gariya
doctors.about: Dr. Priya specializes in neurological disorders, providing comprehensive assessments and treatments.

doctors.name: Dr. Andrew William
doctors.about: Dr. Andrew treats patients suffering from migraines, tension-type headaches, and cluster headaches. He diagnoses chronic neurological disorders, helping patients manage their conditions over time.

doctors.name: Dr. Malinga Wilson
doctors.about: Dr. Malinga specializes in diagnosing and treating conditions related to the gastrointestinal (GI) tract. This includes the esophagus, stomach, intestines, liver, pancreas, and gallbladder. They handle issues like acid reflux, ulcers, IBS, Crohnâ€™s disease, liver disease, and more. Gastroenterologists also perform endoscopic procedures to view the inside of the GI tract and treat problems through minimally invasive techniques.

doctors.name: Dr. Thushara Peris
doctors.about: Dr. Thushara educates patients about reproductive health, family planning, and sexually transmitted infections.

doctors.name: Dr. Emily Davis
doctors.about: Dr. Emily contributes in various procedures including biopsies, mole removals, and treatments for nail conditions.

doctors.name: Dr. Daniel Martin
doctors.about: Dr. Daniel is devoted to the health and well-being of children, offering compassionate and thorough pediatric care.

doctors.name: Dr. Ridmi Dias
doctors.about: Dr. Ridmi believes in a patient-centered approach, ensuring personalized care for each patient. She emphasizes the importance of early detection and prevention, helping patients maintain and improve their digestive health through a combination of lifestyle changes, medication, and advanced treatment options.

doctors.name: Dr. Onel Malik
doctors.about: Dr. Onel evaluates patients with neurological symptoms, such as headaches, seizures, weakness to diagnose conditions accurately.

doctors.name: Dr. Janu Peris
doctors.about: Dr. Janu focuses on building long-term relationships with patients, understanding their medical history, and addressing their overall health needs.

doctors.name: Dr. Ryan Khan
doctors.about: Dr. Riyan provides a wide range of healthcare services, including routine examinations, preventive care, and treatment of various gynecological conditions.

doctors.name: Dr. Shalini Perera
doctors.about: Dr. Amila evaluates, diagnoses, and treats various skin conditions, including common issues like acne and eczema, as well as more complex diseases such as skin cancers.

doctors.name: Dr. Rajesh Fernando
doctors.about: Dr. Rajesh Fernando is a highly skilled cardiologist with expertise in diagnosing and treating heart-related conditions. He specializes in interventional cardiology and has performed numerous successful angioplasties and pacemaker implantations.

doctors.name: Dr. Priyanka Silva
doctors.about: Dr. Priyanka Silva is a renowned dermatologist specializing in skin, hair, and nail disorders. She offers advanced treatments for acne, eczema, psoriasis, and cosmetic dermatology procedures like Botox and fillers.

doctors.name: Dr. Sanjay Bandara
doctors.about: Dr. Sanjay Bandara is an experienced orthopedic surgeon specializing in joint replacements, sports injuries, and fracture management. He is known for his patient-centric approach and minimally invasive surgical techniques.

doctors.name: Dr. Tanuri Bawanya
doctors.about: Dr. Tanuri Bawanya is a compassionate pediatrician dedicated to the health and well-being of children. She specializes in neonatal care, vaccinations, and managing childhood illnesses like asthma and allergies.

doctors.name: Dr. Ishan De Silva
doctors.about: Dr. Ishan De Silva is a skilled psychiatrist specializing in mental health disorders such as depression, anxiety, and bipolar disorder. He provides psychotherapy and medication management to help patients achieve mental wellness.
